text: The Great Impostor is a 1961 American biographical comedy-drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and was based on the 1959 novel of the same name by Robert Crichton. It stars Tony Curtis, Edmond O'Brien, Karl Malden, Raymond Massey, Gary Merrill, Joan Blackman, Arthur O'Connell, Jeanette Nolan and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1961 comedy-drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: The Great Impostor
